titles.title: Hitotsubu ni Kawaranu Ai o Komete
一粒に変わらぬ愛をこめて

anime.description: It`s a sweet short CM for the brand caramel from Morigana in commemoration of their 100th anniversary. It tells the story of a busy housewife that is reminded of her youth after tasting one of the caramels.
